text: Hey <@U025T4D0GL9> can you DM me a link to the email in question?

I figured it out - we're displaying a block of code in the email (dev-focused audience) that includes double curly braces, and HubSpot treats it as an incomplete merge field. Would've been nice if it had given me some type of error message, but after a lot of trial and error I figured it out!

My workaround was to turn this `{{}}` into this `<code>{</clode><code>{</code>&nbsp;<code>}</clode><code>}</code>`
how do I develop custom email templates locally ?
